title: Without this font I'm brand retarded
content:
I bought a shop and the previous owner has this logo everywhere, but this is the largest image she has. . . ergh. So now I cannot design a simple ad that is consistent with what she created, because it's to small. Thanks in advance for your help.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [eco logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013203737/http:/typophile.com/files/eco%20logo.jpg) | 60.67 KB |
author: misscharlie

comments.content: You are an angel - thank you so much
